title: Interpretation of okra in a dream: More than 140 interpretations of a dream of okra in different situations

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of okra in a dream, including the correct interpretations. Okra is a delicious food that most people love, and seeing it in a dream is one of the recurring dreams that many people see in a dream, and the interpretations of dreams vary according to the dreamer's condition and the details he saw in the dream. About the interpretation of the dream of okra, follow us. Interpretation of okra in a dream Dream interpretation scholars differed in interpreting the vision of okra in a dream according to the details that the fortune teller saw as follows: Whoever sees okra in a dream, this dream indicates that God Almighty will grant him a variety of halal foods, which will make him live a life of prosperity and stability, God willing, and it is a message to him not to distract many. From worshipping and obeying God, and fulfilling God’s right in money. It is also a good vision for a person to see okra in his sleep and it has frozen, as this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is suffering from problems in his life, and that it is good news that comfort is approaching and he will escape from sadness. If the okra that one saw in his dream was yellow and out of the fruiting season, this dream indicates that the dreamer will receive unpleasant news that he does not like to hear, which will cause him sadness and discomfort. The symbol of okra in a dream A young man who sees in his dream that he is buying okra and the okra was fresh green, this dream indicates that he will be able to achieve the ambitions he seeks, and if the okra is withered and not fresh, this dream means that he will face many difficulties related to the field of study or work. If a young man dreams that he is eating delicious green okra, this dream means that the dreamer will be associated with a girl of good reputation, known for her good morals and beautiful appearance. A sick person who sees in his dream that he is eating delicious green okra, this dream means that the dreamer will recover from his illness, God willing. One of the praiseworthy dreams is for the dreamer to see in his dream that Planting okra, and this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is trying to earn a legitimate livelihood and that God Almighty will provide him with His grace and help him in earning money, because it shows the profit of trade, and the great profit if the fortune teller works in trade. Planting okra in a dream symbolizes participation in happy occasions, as well as the ability to achieve goals. Interpretation of picking okra in a dream Picking okra from trees in a dream is one of the beautiful visions, as it indicates that the dreamer is going through new circumstances in his life that will come to him after hearing long-awaited good news. Whoever sees in a dream that he is picking okra fruits and the grains are green and beautiful, this dream indicates that the dreamer is struggling in his life and trying to achieve the dreams he wants and that he will be able, God willing, to reach what he wants and get the fruits of his effort, hard work and diligence. Also, if the dreamer is suffering from material problems in reality, this dream means that God Almighty will help him get rid of these problems, and whoever sees this vision must take the reasons and make every effort to get rid of these obstacles. If a person dreams that he is collecting okra seeds that are spoiled or broken,

title: Interpretation of seeing handcuffs and chains in a dream

preview.html: A dream about handcuffs and a detainee: a man tied up to a single girl, about a pregnant woman with her hands tied with shackles, according to Ibn Sirin. Restrictions in a dream are among the dreams that we see often in our dreams, and they carry many meanings and associations that are important to us and that the dreamer must be aware of, as restrictions appear. The concepts within us and the problems we suffer from. Dreamer. Interpretation of restrictions in a dream. Participation in a dream is steadfastness in religion. Perhaps it indicates children, abstaining from travel, or illness, and the chain indicates better than tying it in a dream, and a silver chain indicates stability in the matter of marriage, and if it is of copper: it is stability in what is disliked, and if it is of lead, then it is consistency in a matter in which Weakness and weakness, and if it is from the ropes, then it is steadfastness in religion, even if it is. Made of wood, it is a steadfastness in hypocrisy, and a chain for the frustrated merchant, for the suffering person, for his constant anxiety, and for the sick person for the duration of his illness. And whoever sees that he is chained for the sake of God, he is diligent in the affairs of his family. And whoever sees that he is confined in a city, then he is one of its residents. And whoever sees that he is chained to a house He has injured a woman. And if the prohibited person sees that he has added another restriction, then his illness will die, and if he is in prison, his imprisonment will be prolonged. And whoever sees that he is wearing a green dress, then his job is in the matter of religion and obtaining reward, and if he is white, then his job is in knowledge, jurisprudence, magnificence, and beauty. Even if. Its color is red, so its position is pleasure and enjoyment, and if it is yellow, then the situation is illness. And whoever sees that he is tied with a chain of gold, then he is waiting for lost money. And whoever sees that he is linked to another man who is tied up, this indicates that he has committed a great sin for which he fears the Lord’s vengeance, because God The Almighty says: “And you will see the criminals on that day linked together. . With chains.” Restriction is essentially a concern and poverty. If you find yourself restricted, your enemies will become agitated and annoyed with you. If you see others in chains, you will defeat those who persecute you and excel your comrades. If you see chains, you will be exposed to danger and illness. If you dream of chains, this indicates that terrifying enemies are surrounding you with opposing positions. If you break the chains, this means that you will escape from the traps set by enemies. Interpretation of shackles in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing the dreamer with his hands tied in a dream is evidence of his suffering from losses and difficult crises. Seeing handcuffs in a dream is evidence of distress and tension in the dreamer’s life. Confinement indicates The dreamer in a dream also indicates that he will be exposed to many losses and be exposed to difficult crises. Interpretation of restrictions in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a dog in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she has a desire to start in public life. Seeing an unmarried woman chained in a dream is evidence that she is suffering from some problems. Problems in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman with her hands and feet tied in a dream also indicates that there is envy around her and bad words. Seeing a girl breaking chains in a dream is evidence that her desires and goals will be achieved very soon. Interpretation of chains in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about beautiful eyebrows in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about beautiful eyebrows in a dream. In the beginning, the science of dream interpretation is considered one of the most important Islamic legal sciences, which derives its rulings, controls, and laws from the Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. He has knowledge of many general principles and basic rules, the most important of which are psychology in the Holy Qur’an, interpretation, Prophetic hadiths, and interpretation with the similarity of nouns, in addition to interpretation and similarity of formulas, adverbs, and verbs. The opposite and opposite of its meaning, the inversion, and the interpretation of additions and negatives. General frameworks for interpreting dreams in IslamIt is known that dream interpretation is a comprehensive Islamic legal science, but it is one of the sciences that is not academically recognized in schools, universities, and graduate students, in addition to being exposed to many recent criticisms and severe attacks from the media. Foreign, but there are several general contexts through which visions and dreams are interpreted in Islam, namely: Not everything seen in a dream has an interpretation. The interpretation of dreams can only come from a world. Visions are often symbols. The interpretation of dreams can be General or detailed. Interpretation of visions has many possibilities, of which only one comes true. Interpretation of visions clarifies the future, present and past. May indicate knowledge of the unseen. Good news is in the interpretation of dreams for a good Muslim. The interpreter must know the circumstances of the fortuneteller. Beautiful eyebrows in a dreamIn the beginning it can To be said about the eyebrow or eyebrows, which are the hair above the eye and on the front of the head, as many are interested in knowing the interpretation of “the interpretation of a dream about beautiful eyebrows in a dream,” as this vision indicates a good and beautiful relationship with the family, the family, and the rest of society, so seeing eyebrows that match each other Some mean that marriages will enter your home and beautiful happy occasions will increase, such as a girl who sees in a dream that her mother plucks her eyebrows and shaves them. This indicates the bad morals of that girl and she must be stronger than her and draw closer to God Almighty and stay away from committing sins. The symbol of the eyebrow in a single woman’s dream. The girl is not The married woman Hala, who has never been married and is still under her father’s care, as many girls are interested in searching for an interpretation of the dream of seeing “the symbol of the eyebrow in an unmarried woman’s dream,” such as Ibn Shaheen said in the dream that the separation of the eyebrows means the disintegration of the family. The distance between parents and the emergence of many problems and disagreements within the family, but if an unmarried woman sees the eyebrows connected in a dream, this indicates interdependence, closeness, and family communication, and it is a sign of parents and relatives. On her marriage to a good man in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a wide eyebrow for a single woman. Many Muslims are interested in the science of interpreting visions and dreams and knowing what their dreams mean to reassure their hearts, especially from Western dreams, as there are many girls who are searching for “interpretation of a dream about a wide eyebrow for a single woman.” . As an unmarried woman sees herself with a wide eyebrow, this indicates that she will receive a lot of kindness and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin for everyone

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin For everyone, the dream of seeing a chair in a dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams of the great translator Ibn Sirin, as he is one of the most famous translators in the world. Dreams and visions of the world that occur with people, and many interpreters rely on a group of factors through which the correct interpretation of the dream is found, and many people have sought to interpret the dream of seeing feces in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A dream of feces for a single woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a child’s feces in a dream? What is the interpretation of feces in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin? The matter relates to the interpretation of feces in a dream for a married woman that if she sees the shape of feces in her dream, this indicates that money and great livelihood will come to her. If the feces are on the bed, this indicates evidence of love and tenderness between her husband, in addition to improving the relationship between them, as the sign of feces appears in the dream for the child. And purity, and this is one of the signs of her good treatment and satisfaction with her in this world. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar and translator Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of his dream that he sees feces in a dream, about the judgment that will result from injustice and the end of worry for the dreamer, like what comes out of the stomach of animals and humans. Of feces in the dream shows the proximity of a lot of money to the dreamer, and the interpretation is related to this vision. Mainly in the smell that comes from feces in the dream or dirt and the harm that this feces causes to the public or to the person who sees it. What is the interpretation of a dream of feces for a single woman It has come to an interpretation of seeing feces in an unmarried woman’s dream, which indicates that she is close to releasing the sorrows and fears that surround the girl, and if this girl works in some job, then this vision indicates that she occupies a great position in her work. And when a single woman sees in her dream that he is lounging on the ground, this is evidence of the loss of anxiety and relief from her feeling of loneliness, and this means that she will get married in a short time, so let the dreamer maintain her relationship with God Almighty and get closer to Him and do many acts of obedience and worship. What is the interpretation of seeing feces? A child in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a child’s stool in a dream, according to what the translator Ibn Sirin narrated on the authority of a married woman, is that this vision indicates the imminent fulfillment of desires and the response to prayers. The early age and interpretation of the vision depends on the time in which it occurred and the state in which the person having the vision is close to God Almighty and performs duties and obedience to God Almighty. It is mentioned that the dream of seeing a chair in a dream has positive interpretations as stated by commentators, and at the end of this article we learned what is the interpretation of feces In a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream where she sees a chair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, what is the interpretation of a dream about stool for a single woman, what is the interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for a child in a dream.

It is mentioned that the dream of seeing a chair in a dream has positive interpretations as stated by commentators, and at the end of this article we learned what is the interpretation of feces In a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream where she sees a chair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, what is the interpretation of a dream about stool for a single woman, what is the interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for a child in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dress in a pregnant woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dress in a dream for a pregnant woman, for a married woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, whether it is seeing a long, short, new, old, torn, clean, and dirty dress, according to Ibn Sirin and others. The dress in a dream contains several clues that we learn about according to the details that distinguish each dream from the other, for example, short and long dresses and their colors. Different, as well as seeing wedding dresses, as well as the dreamer if she is married, whether pregnant or unmarried. We will explain all of this through our topic on the interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream, as the dress appears to us in different and important forms that we see all the time. Interpretation of a dress in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s dress if it is Long indicates the birth of a boy, but if the dress that the pregnant woman sees in the dream is short, then it indicates childbirth. Seeing a dress in a pregnant woman’s dream is a direct relationship to the sex of her child, as scholars said that seeing a pregnant woman wearing a long dress in her dream means that she will give birth to a child. Male. Because we saw her wearing a short dress indicating that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of the dress in the dream Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing the dress in a dream as good news about the happy events that the dreamer is going through. Seeing a white dress that covers the entire body is considered a sign of happy news that will soon be transmitted to the viewer. Seeing a wedding dress in a dream is a sign of good luck or success in marriage or work. Interpretation of a dress in a single person’s dream. Seeing a white dress in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of her close relationship and marriage to a good man. The blue color in a single dress is evidence of the prestigious status that he enjoys. It has her life partner. The color black is evidence of the progress of a person with limited abilities. Also, seeing an unmarried girl buying a wedding dress in a dream is a harbinger for her that her marriage will be imminent. Interpretation of the dress in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a long, full dress for a married woman is a sign of her purity and preservation. On herself. Also, seeing a short dress indicates the failure of a married woman in her marital and family life. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a married woman’s dress as evidence of good and cheerful news. Also, seeing a black dress is evidence of the difficulties and fears that the fortuneteller is exposed to, may God protect her. Seeing a woman A married woman wearing a red dress is a sign of pregnancy soon. As for seeing a blue dress, this is good news about the great wealth that she will obtain. Interpretation of a dress in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a dress for a pregnant woman is an indication of the gender of her child, as a long dress is evidence that she will have a child. Male. Seeing a pregnant woman in a short dress indicates that she has given birth to a baby girl. Interpretation of seeing the dress - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a short dress, seeing yourself wearing a dress in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dress in a dream for a single girl married to a pregnant woman Wearing a beautiful dress in red, green, or black Blue Wearing a short or long dress Buying a dress by Ibn Sirin and more Interpretation of a short dress in a dream If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a short dress, this is a sign of a lack of Her affairs. However, if the dress in the dream is long and covers her entire body, then this is a sign that she is a conservative woman. The white dress is evidence of joy, green is religion, blue is nutrition, red is pregnancy, and black is sadness, problems or disagreements. Who dreams of wearing these clothes during the holidays? There is nothing wrong with gatherings, and the yellowing of all clothes is a disease and weakness for the owner of the garment to whom this garment is attributed in the interpretation, except with silk or silk. Or a brocade dress, it helps him, but it is a corruption of the religion. And whoever sees that he has clothes dyed in different colors, and then hears from his Lord what he hates, let him seek refuge in God from the evil of this. And whoever sees that he is wearing colored clothes, this is for someone who sold the air or had a good drink. Women are fine, especially the rich, prostitutes, and singers. Whoever dreams of wearing beautiful clothes is performing the Hajj obligation. Interpretation of the dress in a dream for a single woman. The dress in an unmarried woman’s dream is the groom. If it is white, it indicates the religious and moral groom, and if it is red, it shows the groom. Who has already married. Interpretation of a dress in a dream for a pregnant woman. If the dress in a pregnant woman’s dream was long, it means the birth of a boy, but if the dress that the pregnant woman saw in her dream was short, it means the birth of a girl. Interpretation of a wedding dress in a dream. A white wedding dress in a dream is evidence Good and happy news. It indicates travel, marriage, work, and often symbolizes profit and success, especially if it is new and beautiful. Buying a wedding dress or a wedding dress in one dream is a sign of the approaching wedding. Whoever dreams in a dream that he wears woolen clothes, then he practices and invites people To asceticism in this world and wants to do his work later. Interpretation of a green dress in a dream: It was said: Whoever wears green will inherit, and a white dress is better for the one who wears it in a dream. Interpretation of a black dress in a dream (and whoever sees) that he is wearing a black dress that he is not accustomed to wearing, and some of it he does not like It is for those who wear it for vigilance, honour, strength, money and sobriety. The interpretation of the red dress in a dream (and whoever dreams) is that he is wearing red clothes, then he will gain a lot of money, and he has a right to God Almighty, so he fears God and pays zakat. You see that she is wearing a red dress, this is her joy. The red dress shows death to the sick and the poor is harmful, and turning the dress and all kinds of annoying dyes, some people show wounds, others fever, and women's clothing is better. For those who are not married only and for those who have not surrendered to the duel, the dress of the vision - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bird cage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a birdcage. Do you know the interpretation of a dream about a birdcage in a dream? A cage in a dream can generally indicate profit and a large financial return for those who see it. You may also be interested in meeting a monkey in a dream, it can also indicate joy, love, and achieving goals, and in this The article will learn the interpretation of this dream for single people, married people, pregnant women, divorcees, widows, and males. You may also be interested in: The plane in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a birdcage for a single woman. Whatever the status of a single woman in terms of study, work, or social life, there are many different interpretations when seeing a cage Birds These interpretations include: This dream indicates the nearness of hearing good news or the presence of goodness, happiness, and blessing in her life and the fulfillment of desires and goals. If the cage is empty, there are two interpretations: The first is that the girl will get married soon and travel with her husband. While the second is that one of her relatives will die, so in some Sometimes it is an unpleasant vision in its interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about a bird cageInterpretation of a dream about a bird cage for a married womanDepending on the dreamer’s condition, the dream is interpreted and therefore there are many interpretations when a married woman sees in a bird cage, such as: Seeing a bird cage in a dream means that she will get a lot of Money in her life, and she will be blessed and will live happily and prosperously. If the cage is empty, this is a sign that he will travel soon. If the cage contains a bird, this may indicate that the woman’s marital life is unstable or that she will be exposed to problems and fears in her life. You may be interested in: The girl in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bird cage for a pregnant woman. Seeing a cage in her dream has many connotations, and below we will show you some of them: If the cage is large in size and beautiful in shape, this may indicate the ease of the birth process and that her pregnancy period will pass safely without any danger to her life or the life of her fetus. If If the cage contains a bird, this may indicate that he is facing difficulties in moving and giving birth, as well as that he may face some difficulties and difficulties related to other matters. If there are eggs inside the cage, this is a sign of upcoming goodness and happiness, as well as money and a lot of livelihood that he will gain The dreamer. You may be interested: Crying and oppression in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bird cage for a man. A man who sees a bird cage in his dream is a sign that all his dreams will come true. If he cleans the cage in the dream, this indicates that he will be exposed to some crises and problems in his life and will stumble financially, but he will overcome All these difficulties. If he buys a cage with many birds, this is evidence that he is strengthening the relationship of kinship and friendship between his family and relatives. You may be interested in: Seeing home and room furniture in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a bird cage for a divorced womanSeeing a bird cage in a dream can mean that a divorced girl will get On the life partner who will spend the rest of her life with her. If there is only one bird inside the cage, this may indicate the death of the other life partner. But if the cage is empty

title: Interpretation of seeing men in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream Many people wonder about it, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman, and the vision of a man in a dream varies according to the social relationship between the man and the dreamer. The wife's vision of her husband, for example, differs from seeing her father or brother, and the man's vision of his brother differs from seeing his father or one of his friends. Interpretations also differ depending on the beauty and ugliness of this person. Seeing a beautiful person differs from seeing others, and the interpretation of the vision differs according to the viewer. The vision of an unmarried woman differs from the vision of a pregnant woman, and the vision of a woman is not a vision for a man, and between these differences, commentators have worked hard to show an appropriate interpretation for each of these cases. Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream Whenever a person sees a handsome man in a dream. This indicates the good news that awaits this person. Because his morals are good and his good characteristics are evidence of his closeness to God Almighty. This is not good news and evidence that this person will face many difficulties in his life and his life will be very difficult as a result of these problems. But if a person sees a naked man in a dream. This is evidence that Almighty God will afflict that person with a disease. But if he sees in a dream a man taking off his clothes inside the mosque, is this true? This is evidence that this man was committing many sins in his life, and God Almighty allowed him to repent. So that he lives a safe and stable life, and if a person sees in a dream that he is trying to cover up his faults in a dream. This is evidence that this person is working to reform himself in all aspects of his life and that his life will change for the better. As a result of this attempt to reform. Interpretation of a man's dream in a dream when he is a single womanAnd if a person sees a man in a dream. The interpretation of his vision varies according to her beauty. If an unmarried woman sees a handsome man in her dream. This is evidence that this girl's husband is blessed with beauty, and if she sees him smiling, this is evidence that this girl's life is full of happiness and joy, and if an unmarried woman sees a man in her dream, she knows who he is. Close to her in age? This is evidence that this person will overcome this girl and that he has loved her deeply for a long time, but he cannot express his love for her. This is evidence that this girl's husband will be a righteous man who fears God Almighty in her heart and deals with what pleases God Almighty and His Messenger. As for if the unmarried woman sees in her dream a man with an ugly face or a bad personality, this is evidence that the man with bad morals has priority over this girl, so she accepts him, but their life will be unstable. In light of the many problems that this family will fall into, and this is a sign that this girl must be careful in choosing the right man for her. To live a happy life, but if an unmarried woman sees a barefoot man in her dream. This is evidence that this girl's life will be bad. Why marry a poor man? Interpretation of a man seeing a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees a strange man in her dream. This is evidence of good news for this woman, and that the

title: Interpretation of seeing a turtle feeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing Ibn Sirin feeding a turtle in a dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is feeding the turtle, this vision indicates that this person has a lot of sustenance and God will reward you more. If a man dreams that he is feeding a turtle, then this vision indicates an abundance of money and blessings upon him, and that he will help others in many ways. Of the matters.Interpretation of seeing a turtle getting pregnant in a dream: If a person sees in his dream that there is a pregnant turtle that will give birth, this vision can be an indication that this dreamer is blessed with goodness and blessings in his life, and this is the grace of God Almighty. If the dreamer sees in his dream, a small turtle, and this vision of births is A sign of the coming days and that they will be happy days, God willing. If someone sees in a dream a large turtle giving birth to a very large number of small turtles, then this vision indicates an abundance of nutrition. Interpretation of a large turtle in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. If the dreamer sees in his dream, a large turtle in terms of size This vision indicates that the person having the vision may live with blessings, prosperity, and abundance in life. If one sees in a dream that he is eating the meat of a large turtle, then this vision indicates that this person will be honored by Almighty God with unlimited knowledge and people will benefit from him. Interpretation of seeing a turtle In a man’s dreamIf a man sees a turtle in his dream, then this vision indicates that this person has a lot of knowledge. If one sees in his dream that there are turtles, do some of these. This vision shows that this man will benefit many with his knowledge that God Almighty has honored. If one sees a turtle in In a dream and standing on one of the seashores, this vision indicates that this person may travel to a place to gain knowledge. If one sees a sea turtle in his dream, this is a sign that this person is traveling for money and God will honor you with a lot of money. Help others with things Many. Interpretation of a dream about a turtle dying in a dream. If someone sees in his dream a turtle dying, then this vision expresses getting rid of all the problems that that person faces. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a large number of turtles dying, this is a sign for the dreamer that he will lose a lot. Of money, but he will compensate for this loss. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in the house by Al-Osaimi If the dreamer sees a turtle living in his house, then this vision is considered a sign of optimism and happiness for the dreamer. If one sees in a dream that there is a turtle in the courtyard of the house, this is a sign that shows the amount of peace and tranquility that It can be found in that house. If the dreamer sees in his dream that there is a turtle in the kitchen of his house, then this vision indicates that there is great goodness on the way for that person. Interpretation of turtle eggs in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIf the dreamer sees turtle eggs in a dream, then this vision It indicates a large amount of profit that the dreamer can obtain. If the dreamer sees turtle eggs in his dream, this is a clear indication of a wide trade that God Almighty will honor him with. Interpretation of a dream about a turtle in the seaIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream a turtle walking in the sea, then
